metadata.title: CVE-2022-23773 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: cmd/go in Go before 1.16.14 and 1.17.x before 1.17.7 can misinterpretbranch names that falsely appear to be version tags. This can lead toincorrect access control if an actor is supposed to be able to createbranches but not tags.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
